panels.title: SLI01: requests to the Grafana landing page are successful

targets.expr:
sum(sum_over_time((sli_value{service="monitoring", sli="SLI01", journey="grafana",
sli_environment=~"$environment"
, sli_type="availability"}
< bool 0.10000000000000001)[7d:1m]))
/
sum(sum_over_time((sli_value{service="monitoring", sli="SLI01", journey="grafana",
sli_environment=~"$environment"
, sli_type="availability"}
< bool Inf)[7d:1m]) > 0)

(0.10000000000000001 - (1 - (sum(sum_over_time((sli_value{service="monitoring", sli="SLI01", journey="grafana",
sli_environment=~"$environment"
, sli_type="availability"}
< bool 0.10000000000000001)[7d:1m]))
/
sum(sum_over_time((sli_value{service="monitoring", sli="SLI01", journey="grafana",
sli_environment=~"$environment"
, sli_type="availability"}
< bool Inf)[7d:1m])))))
/
0.10000000000000001

panels.description: Error rate for Grafana landing page requests should be below 10.0%

targets.expr:
sum_over_time((sli_value{service="monitoring", sli="SLI01", journey="grafana",
sli_environment=~"$environment"
, sli_type="availability"} < bool 0.10000000000000001)[$__interval:1m])
/ 
sum_over_time((sli_value{service="monitoring", sli="SLI01", journey="grafana",
sli_environment=~"$environment"
, sli_type="availability"} < bool Inf)[$__interval:1m])

1 - (
  sum_over_time((sli_value{service="monitoring", sli="SLI01", journey="grafana",
sli_environment=~"$environment"
, sli_type="availability"} < bool 0.10000000000000001)[$__interval:1m])
  / 
  sum_over_time((sli_value{service="monitoring", sli="SLI01", journey="grafana",
sli_environment=~"$environment"
, sli_type="availability"} < bool Inf)[$__interval:1m])
)

panels.description:
* Sample interval is 1m
* Selectors are job=\~"grafana", handler=\~"/api/dashboards/home"
* Error selectors are status_code=~"4..|5.."

targets.expr: sum(rate(grafana_http_request_duration_seconds_count{job=~"grafana",handler=~"/api/dashboards/home",namespace=~"$environment"}[1m]))
sum(rate(grafana_http_request_duration_seconds_count{job=~"grafana",handler=~"/api/dashboards/home",namespace=~"$environment", status_code=~"4..|5.."}[1m]) or vector(0))

sum(rate(grafana_http_request_duration_seconds_count{job=~"grafana",handler=~"/api/dashboards/home",namespace=~"$environment", status_code=~"4..|5.."}[1m]) or vector(0))
/
sum(rate(grafana_http_request_duration_seconds_count{job=~"grafana",handler=~"/api/dashboards/home",namespace=~"$environment"}[1m]))
